About.paragraph: I’m Abhay Tai, a final-year student at NIT Karnataka and Co-Convenor of Incub8, the institute’s largest business summit. I’m passionate about solving business problems and building startups. With strong communication and leadership skills, I have led multiple teams across NITK and various startup ventures.
